articles.title: COVID-19 cases in Ireland top 70,000 - ANI News
articles.description: Dublin [Ireland], November 22 (ANI/Xinhua): Ireland reported 344 new COVID-19 cases on Saturday, bringing the country's caseload to 70,143, according to the Irish Department of Health.
